name: src/EntriesClient.js
EntriesClient
description: Client for accessing Caldera Forms entry data via Caldera Forms REST API

name: getEntries
description: Get one page of entries for a form

params.name: formId
params.description: ID of form to get entries for.

params.name: page
params.description: Optional. Which page of entries to get. Default is 1.

description: Get a single entry of a form

params.name: formId
params.description: ID of form to get entries for.

params.name: entryId
params.description: ID of entry to find.

description: Delete a single entry of a form

params.name: formId
params.description: ID of form to get entries for.

params.name: entryId
params.description: ID of entry to find.

description: Delete all entries of a form

params.name: formId
params.description: ID of form to get entries for.

name: resendEntry
description: Resent a single entry of a form

params.name: formId
params.description: ID of form to get entries for.

params.name: entryId
params.description: ID of entry to find.

name: getEntriesEndpoint
description: The endpoint URI for a collection of entries for one form.

params.name: formId
params.description: ID of form to get entries for.

name: getEntryEndpoint
description: The endpoint URI for single entries

params.name: formId
params.description: ID of form to get entries for.

params.name: entryId
params.description: ID of entry to find.

name: getEntryResendEndpoint
description: The resend endpoint URI for single entries

params.name: formId
params.description: ID of form to get entries for.

params.name: entryId
params.description: ID of entry to find.

prepareGeneralSettingsData
description: Prepare data for

params.name: styleIncludes
params.description: Style includes settings. Each value defaults to true

params.name: cdnEnable
params.description: Is CDN enabled? Default false

types: {styleIncludes: {grid: boolean, form: boolean, alert: boolean}, otherSettings: {cdnEnable: boolean}}

description: Get and update a site's general settings

name: updateSettings

PrivacySettingsClient

ProLocalSettingClient

wpClientFactory
description: Create a WordPress API client

params.name: wpApiUrl

params.name: wpApiNonce
params.description: The REST API nonce

params.name: type
params.description: Optional. Type of client forms|privacy|generic Default is generic

content:
# caldera-api-client
JavaScript API client for [Caldera Forms REST API](https://calderaforms.com/doc/caldera-forms-rest-api/) and Caldera Forms Pro REST API.

🌋 👀 [Documentation](https://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/)

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client.svg)
[![Documentation Status](https://travis-ci.org/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client.svg)
[![Maintainability](https://api.codeclimate.com/v1/badges/a2e2c1afbb3eae8a6635/maintainability)](https://codeclimate.com/github/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client/maintainability)
## Install
`npm i @caldera-labs/api-client`

## Usage
Create a form client and use it to get page one of form configs via API
```js
import {wpClientFactory} from '@caldera-labs/api-client';

const formsAdminApiClient = wpClientFactory(
	'https://hiroy.club/wp-json/cf-api/v2', //root of Caldera Forms REST API namespace
	'12345', //the nonce for REST API cookie authentication
    	'forms' //type of client to get
);
let forms = [];
formsAdminApiClient(page).then(r => {
	forms = r;
}).catch(error => {
	console.log(error);
	throw error;
});
```

See: [http://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/manual/overview.html#usage](http://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/manual/overview.html#usage)

## Development Requirements
* [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/get-npm)
* [Yarn](https://yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/install/#mac-stable)
* [Git]()
* [Flow](https://flow.org/en/docs/install/)


## Testing

We use [Facebook Jest](https://facebook.github.io/jest/) for unit tests. Test go in the directory `__tests__`.

* Run test watcher
```
yarn test
```

Make sure to review the docs on [testing requests](http://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/manual/overview.html#mocking-requests)

## Scripts

### Build for release
* `yarn build`
    - Runs tests, and flow type checks and Babel compiles with minification and source map.

This script calls a pre, compile, and post subcommands.  For consistency, please call other scripts at those three events.

### Tests
*`yarn test`
    - Run test watcher
* `npm test:once` 
    - Run tests once

### Type-checking With Flow
* `yarn flow`

### Lint Code
* `yarn lint`
    - Run linter and fixer watch
* `yarn lint:fix`
    - Lint and fix code once
* `yarn lint:once`
    - Lint code once


### Generate Documentation
* `npm run documentation`
    - Generates documentation from inline docs
    - Generates documentation from markdown files in /manual

### Release To npm
Must be [logged in as project maintainer via npm cli](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/adduser)

* `yarn release`
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "@caldera-labs/api-client",
  "version": "0.6.0",
  "description": "API client for Caldera Forms and Caldera Forms Pro",
  "main": "./dist/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "npm run build:pre && npm run build:compile && npm run build:post",
    "build:pre": "npm run test:once",
    "build:compile": "./node_modules/.bin/babel -d dist src/",
    "build:post": "npm run compress && npm run document",
    "compress": " uglifyjs-folder dist -c -m --source-map -o dist/index.min.js",
    "test": "jest --watch",
    "test:once": "jest",
    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage",
    "coveralls": "cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node node_modules/.bin/coveralls",
    "prepublish": "npm run build",
    "document": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "lint": "eslint src/**, __tests__/**",
    "lint:watch": "esw src/**, __tests__/** --fix --watch",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src/**, __tests__/** --fix ",
    "flow:watch": "flow-watch",
    "flow": "flow ",
    "release": "npm run release:patch",
    "release:minor": "npm version minor -m \"version %s\" && npm publish",
    "release:patch": "npm version patch -m \"version %s\" && npm publish"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/calderawp/caldera-api-client.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "es6",
    "boilerplate",
    "npm",
    "module",
    "npm-module"
  ],
  "author": "Josh Pollock <Josh@calderawp.com>",
  "license": "GPL-2.0",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/calderawp/caldera-api-client/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/",
  "dependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-eslint": "^8.2.3",
    "babel-preset-flow": "^6.23.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.1",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^16.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-flowtype": "^2.49.3",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.12.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.0.3",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.9.1",
    "eslint-watch": "^3.1.5",
    "flow-bin": "^0.74.0",
    "flow-watch": "^1.1.3",
    "jest-fetch-mock": "^1.6.3",
    "locutus": "^2.0.9",
    "uglify-js": "^3.4.0",
    "uglifyjs-folder": "^1.5.1",
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-jest": "^20.0.3",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-stage-2": "^6.24.1",
    "coveralls": "^2.13.3",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-flow-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jest": "^21.17.0",
    "jest-cli": "^23.2",
    "istanbul": "^0.4.5",
    "istanbul-api": "1.2.2",
    "istanbul-reports": "1.1.4"
  },
  "standard": {
    "plugins": [
      "flowtype"
    ],
    "parser": "babel-eslint"
  },
  "jest": {
    "collectCoverageFrom": [
      "src/**/*.js"
    ],
    "coverageThreshold": {
      "global": {
        "statements": 85,
        "branches": 75,
        "functions": 85,
        "lines": 85
      }
    },
    "automock": false,
    "setupFiles": [
      "./setupJest.js"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json

content:
# Caldera API Client Documentation
This library was first used in Caldera Forms [in this pull request](https://github.com/CalderaWP/Caldera-Forms/pull/2611)

[Caldera Forms REST API documentation](https://calderaforms.com/doc/caldera-forms-rest-api/)

content:
# caldera-api-client
JavaScript API client for [Caldera Forms REST API](https://calderaforms.com/doc/caldera-forms-rest-api/) and Caldera Forms Pro REST API.

🌋 👀 [Documentation](https://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/)

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client.svg)
[![Documentation Status](https://travis-ci.org/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client.svg)
[![Maintainability](https://api.codeclimate.com/v1/badges/a2e2c1afbb3eae8a6635/maintainability)](https://codeclimate.com/github/CalderaWP/caldera-api-client/maintainability)
## Install
`npm i @caldera-labs/api-client`

## Usage
Create a form client and use it to get page one of form configs via API
```js
import {wpClientFactory} from '@caldera-labs/api-client';

const formsAdminApiClient = wpClientFactory(
	'https://hiroy.club/wp-json/cf-api/v2', //root of Caldera Forms REST API namespace
	'12345', //the nonce for REST API cookie authentication
    	'forms' //type of client to get
);
let forms = [];
formsAdminApiClient(page).then(r => {
	forms = r;
}).catch(error => {
	console.log(error);
	throw error;
});
```

See: [http://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/manual/overview.html#usage](http://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/manual/overview.html#usage)

## Development Requirements
* [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/get-npm)
* [Yarn](https://yarnpkg.com/lang/en/docs/install/#mac-stable)
* [Git]()
* [Flow](https://flow.org/en/docs/install/)


## Testing

We use [Facebook Jest](https://facebook.github.io/jest/) for unit tests. Test go in the directory `__tests__`.

* Run test watcher
```
yarn test
```

Make sure to review the docs on [testing requests](http://calderalabs.org/caldera-api-client/manual/overview.html#mocking-requests)

## Scripts

### Build for release
* `yarn build`
    - Runs tests, and flow type checks and Babel compiles with minification and source map.

This script calls a pre, compile, and post subcommands.  For consistency, please call other scripts at those three events.

### Tests
*`yarn test`
    - Run test watcher
* `npm test:once` 
    - Run tests once

### Type-checking With Flow
* `yarn flow`

### Lint Code
* `yarn lint`
    - Run linter and fixer watch
* `yarn lint:fix`
    - Lint and fix code once
* `yarn lint:once`
    - Lint code once


### Generate Documentation
* `npm run documentation`

    - Generates documentation from markdown files in /manual

### Release To npm
Must be [logged in as project maintainer via npm cli](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/adduser)
